cause.description:
We are a non-profit corporation with federal 501(c)3 designation, and our operating expenses are funded by dues and donations. We are supported by many other organizations and recognized by the cities of Prescott, Prescott Valley, and Chino Valley, as well as Yavapai County, the USDA Forest Service, the Bureau of Land Management, and the state of Arizona.
1. Mapped and promoted Prescott Circle Trail
2. Drafted the Yavapai County Master Trail Plan
3. Influenced City of Prescott to adopt a Trail Policy and subsequent Trail Plan
cause.mission: protecting, preserving, and developing recreational, non-motorized trails.
cause.name: Yavapai Trails Association
